title: Metadata of the demo NFT collection for the game ZoneX.
description: Metadata of the demo NFT collection for the game ZoneX.

tech.trait.wallet.nft_token_description.nft_token_description: In a world where chaos reigns, one helmet stands as a beacon of defiance. With its vibrant yellow and blue stripes, this helmet tells the tale of countless battles fought and victories earned. Scuffed and worn, it embodies the spirit of resilience, representing a fearless warrior ready to face any challenge. The visor, a dark shield against the unknown, conceals the determination of its wearer. As the battlefield looms ahead, the air is thick with anticipation. Will you don this iconic helmet and charge into the fray, leaving a mark on history? The choice is yours, brave adventurer. Embrace the challenge!
